trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="AudioStateChanged" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento <see langword="AudioStateChanged" /> da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property gets a new instance of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration when a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> or a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> propriedade obtém uma nova instância do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeração quando um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the current state of the audio input using the `AudioState` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: Você pode obter o estado atual do áudio de entrada usando o `AudioState` propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates an event handler for handling the changing audio state of a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra um manipulador de eventos para lidar com o estado de áudio de alteração de um mecanismo de reconhecimento de fala.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new state of audio input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o novo estado de entrada de áudio para o reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: The state of audio input after a <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged" /> or a <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged" /> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O estado de entrada de áudio após um <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged" /> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property contains one of three values from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> propriedade contém um dos três valores da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeração.
